meta_description: Welcome to The Aldrich Contemporary Art Museum, plan your visit, see our exhibitions, participate in public programs, and learn about the artists on view.
hours_text:
We’re open today from 10 am to 5 pm   
258 Main Street, Ridgefield, CT 06877

### Hours and Admission

Hours

---|---  
Sunday |  12 pm to 5 pm

---|---  
Adults |  $20  
Seniors (60+) |  $15  
Students |  $9  
Members  
Educators  
Children under 13  
Military Families  
Third Saturdays |  Free  
  
Final entry for all visitors is 4:40 pm  
The Museum is closed on the following holidays:  
Thanksgiving, Christmas Day, New Year’s Day.  
Contact us at 203.438.4519 or [general@thealdrich.org](mailto:general@thealdrich.org)

accessibility_text:
[Learn](/learn)

## Accessibility Programs

The Aldrich is committed to providing a welcoming and accessible environment for all. For help navigating the Museum or any questions you may have please reach out to us at [general@thealdrich.org](mailto:general@thealdrich.org) or ask any staff member upon visiting.  

#### Admission

The Aldrich is pleased to offer several opportunities to visit at no cost.  

Admission is free the third Saturday of each month. Visit the [Events page](https://thealdrich.org/events) for more information on upcoming Third Saturdays. Aldrich Members always receive year-round free admission to the Museum and our reciprocal partners. Visit the [Membership page](https://nam04.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fthealdrich.org%2Fsupport%2Fmembership&data=05%7C01%7Cnbayarsaihan%40thealdrich.org%7Cb16c3c3ecf8e4937c84408dbb3b48368%7Cb704254ef99b43daadeb9a5be3438fd7%7C1%7C0%7C638301360124356744%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=zFxDt7EQhUntBVczShVgSyoPpA71sF%2FdMRcYwpoDlaE%3D&reserved=0) for more information on our levels and to join.  

We participate in:

  * [Museums for All](https://museums4all.org), offering free admission for up to four visitors. Tickets can be redeemed at the Front desk by presenting a Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) membership or, Electronic Benefits Transfer (EBT) card.

  * [Blue Star Museums](https://bluestarfam.org/fami...
